metadata.title: Mesieim - The New Way to Finance Children's Weddings
metadata.description: The organization connecting the world of Gemachim with the capital market, enabling Haredi families to finance their children's weddings through innovative financial thinking.

hero.title: The New Way
hero.subtitle: To Finance Children's Weddings
hero.description: The organization connecting the world of Gemachim with the capital market, enabling Haredi families to finance their children's weddings through innovative, beneficial, and long-term financial thinking using the Lovest method.

combined_savings.title: Combined Savings Offering
combined_savings.subtitle: High Returns Together with Certainty.
combined_savings.description: Our unique combination includes a solid path and a more volatile path. The solid path consists of Gemach and community programs, providing security and peace of mind, while the volatile path is invested in the stock market and the S&P 500 index – a leading and safe index for the long term, including the largest and most stable companies in the USA.
combined_savings.benefits: Both certainty and returns; both Gemach and stock market; both compound interest and comfortable loans; both reasonable monthly deposits and significant loan repayment discounts after the wedding; both calculated risk and responsibility for children.

communities.title: Partner Communities
communities.subtitle: This is not a private or experimental initiative
communities.description: Already today, it is backed by some of the strongest, most established, and most influential communities in the Haredi sector.

trust.title: Your Money Stays Yours
trust.subtitle: Mesieim does not hold funds
trust.description: All funds are always deposited in the depositor's name, in personal accounts, with regulated entities, and under the family's full control. Mesieim does not touch the money and is not 'in the way'.
